channel.title: Sword FINISH (Possibly ADD MORE TO IT LIKE DETAILS) SMALLUPDATED 1st Model
channel.description:
Ok I finally finished it What do you think?
[b]Changes that might be added over time[/b] More detail.. Color change... Add more to the sword itself SUGGESTIONS
SMALL UPDATE [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/213el45.jpg[/img]
[b]Things done since last post(s)[/b] 3D Remake Different Colors Longer/Skinnier Handle Skinnier Blade Design All I could think of That I did to it :rolleyes:
The uneven part where the point of the blade is was made on purpose..
Hope you like it!!! =P
Post your SUGGESTIONS!!!
Thanks, :)

item.title: Sword FINISH (Possibly ADD MORE TO IT LIKE DETAILS) SMALLUPDATED 1st Model
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Yeah the program is hard… Althought it’s just connecting little points together… It’s harder than it seems… I think the sword will be good as it is until I am better and more use to this program then I will remake it.

Oh yeah give me ideas on a model I should try to make… like bow, sword, dagger etc. Try to keep it in weapons category cause I got no idea how to do clothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Sword FINISH (Possibly ADD MORE TO IT LIKE DETAILS) SMALLUPDATED 1st Model
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

I don’t really care if you don’t like it just as long as your honest =/… This is my first model and I’m still learning the Model program

Yeah I’ve remade this thing 2 times and the 2nd one looks similar to this…

I don’t know if it’s the image I have in my head… Or I don’t really Know how to make it…

The problem is If I make it skinnier If I have that handle (The red part) Anyway I tried making it it was too big for the blade to fit in and that’s the closest I could get… So I dunno

I could make the black handle skinnier and remake the blade etc.

I think it’s the idea I have for it… But it looks 10x better in the Metasquoia weirdly… I think I may keep it as it is then Move on to another model

Read full topic

item.title: Sword FINISH (Possibly ADD MORE TO IT LIKE DETAILS) SMALLUPDATED 1st Model
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

Well TBH, a logo is a little unnecessary if your character will be holding it by the handle, as you probably won’t see it too well on the drop model.

If, however, you move it there would be more sense.
Ummm… No idea for a logo. Maybe draw a little squiggle that looks like a rune symbol (as in Viking runes).

Read full topic
